title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are buildable resources in the workspace.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Java perspective. 
2. Right-click anywhere in the workspace to open the context-sensitive popup menu. 
3. Observe that the "Build" action is always enabled, regardless of the workspace contents.
